titleStmt.title: A sermon, at the funeral solemnitie of the most high and mighty Prince Ferdinandus, the late Emperour of most famous memorye holden in the Cathedrall Churche of saint Paule in London, the third of October. 1564. Made by the reuerend father in God, Edmund Grindall, bishop of London.
titleStmt.author: Grindal, Edmund, 1519?-1583.

titleStmt.title: A sermon, at the funeral solemnitie of the most high and mighty Prince Ferdinandus, the late Emperour of most famous memorye holden in the Cathedrall Churche of saint Paule in London, the third of October. 1564. Made by the reuerend father in God, Edmund Grindall, bishop of London.
titleStmt.author: Grindal, Edmund, 1519?-1583.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Day, dwelling ouer Aldersgate, beneath saint Martins. Cum gratia & priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis. These bookes are to be sold at hys shop vnder the Gate,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A funeral sermon preached in Paules Church.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
